message.body: Bridge! It's been too long. Richard and I will be in va between Xmas and New Years - I'm sure you're swamped but if you have a minute, I would love to see you and Jason and meet lil grace!
Juls! Jason and I were just talking about you two and wondering if you'd be here around the holidays. Other than Christmas and Christmas Eve, we are hanging around Fairfax. Lets definitely hang out!
Excelente!! Let's see how the week shapes up & make a plan - let me know if any time is better for you?
